title: In law - Private Master Room - All Utilities
posting_body: This unit is only for single occupant and available starting Aug 15th
Master studio for rent with private entrance in Union City (close border to Fremont)!
Please keep in mind that there are other tenants on the property.
There is no shared space with other tenants and it has a completely separate entrance.
In close proximity to Dumbarton bridge and Union City Bart Station
Huge benefit is that the owner pays for all utilities including Electricity, Gas, Water, Trash, Internet (no cable) so it is all inclusive.
No kitchen and instead comes with microwave and refrigerator.
If interested, please email a bit about yourself
